title: Foundational Anatomy Education through Active Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Middle school-level foundational life science knowledge
context.additional_context: Applying a blended approach that integrates digital devices with traditional methods, utilizing practical materials optimized for non-face-to-face environments.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately define over 80% of key anatomical terms related to respiratory system structures
Learners can analyze spatial relationships between major organs using 3D anatomy software
Learners can submit creative outputs visualizing anatomical concepts through collaborative learning activities
Structure identification is possible with 90% accuracy when using digital labeling tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
